about_the_game:
The game play depicts the process of the virus penetrating into the server and taking control.

Knowing that his company's life and death was on the line with the announcement of a new AI technology by an emerging company, CEO Mo commissioned a hacker to hack the server and poured everything into it to steal this technology. The hands of a competent hacker combine the ai technology of a large company to create a mutant virus with "self". Viruses have amazing physicality, such as using survival-specific skills or reviving more powerfully with data. In some cases, they work together to solve difficult puzzle gimmicks in a cool way.

Choose four wonderful characters to create the visual virus you want.
Create your own style of play by combining four different types of assault rifle, SMG, sniper rifle, and shotgun guns and multiple skills to clear the stage faster.
Regular programs and vaccines inside the computer stage will keep your virus from trying to destroy the computer!
But I believe you will take control of this computer with powerful guns and skills, and great gimmick pahaw capabilities.

Become a virus right now and hack your servers!

name: PWN!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 호환 사운드 카드

short_description: PWN! is a third-person shooter with a cyberpunk setting. Become a virus invading a computer, defeat anti-virus monsters, and destroy security gimmicks to clear the stage. Four types of guns and several types of skills will make your play more diverse.
